Canvideo

  • Start Creating
  • Github
  • Npm
Canvideo is a tool for creating videos. It runs on Node.js. The user adds shapes and scenes to the video, which can be animated. Then canvideo renders all the frames and uses ffmpeg to turn them into a video.
  • Use Node.js or this web gui.
    • Canvideo is mainly used in Node.js, and it is an npm package. You can use canvideo in any node.js project with the npm module.
    • There is also a user interface to create canvideo compatible videos. The api and user interface is being made on this website. This is great for people who want to create videos without programming.
  • Create a video.
    • Choose the width, height, and fps of the video.
    • Add scenes to the video
      • Choose from many different shapes
        • Rectangles
        • Circles
        • Polygons
        • Number Lines
        • Paths
        • Groups of Shapes
      • Animate the shapes
        • Change the different properties or positions of shapes. For example, with a rectangle, you can animate the x, y, width, height, and color. With color animations, you can even change individual rgba values. Animations are linear, so for example, if an animation starts at 6 seconds with x being 0, and ends at 8 seconds with x being 100, then at 9 seconds x would be 50.
        • Change values of a shape. This doesn't create a linear animation, but it is useful for instantly changing the size or color of a shape.
      • Add the shapes to the scenes
        • When adding shapes, you can specify the time the shape enters the scene and the duration that the shape lasts. Scenes are used to separate the video into different sections, so that you don't have to add or subtract timings from future shapes when adjusting previous ones.
      • Set the background color of scenes
    • Add subtitles to the video
      • Subtitles can be embedded
      • Subtitles can be generated as a separate file.
      • Multiple subtitle tracks can be used. This is useful for having multiple languages.
  • Node.js is used to basically do everything. Node.js is amazing.
  • Express is a module for Node.js that is used to serve files and create an API on this website.
  • PaperCSS is used for frontend CSS. You are seeing it right now.
  • Ffmpeg is used for generating the video from frames. Canvideo wouldn't work without it.
